biasgame.no_dm: You are not allowed to play bias game in DMs.
biasgame.in_progress:
A bias game is currently in progress in this channel.
Only 1 Bias Game can run in a channel at once.
If this is a mistake, use {server_prefix}stopbg.
biasgame.start_game: Starting a {bracket_size} bracket bias game for {gender} idols.
biasgame.unexpected_error: An error has occurred and the game has ended. Please report this.
biasgame.force_closed: The current game has now ended due to not responding in time or it was force closed.
biasgame.no_wins: There are no bias game wins for {name}.

blackjack.not_in_game: {name}, you are not in a blackjack game.
blackjack.in_game: {name}, you are already in a blackjack game. Please type {server_prefix}stopbj.
blackjack.ended_game: {name}, your blackjack game has successfully ended.
blackjack.opponent_not_in_game: {name}, that player is not in a blackjack game.
blackjack.announce_winner: {name} has won the blackjack game with {integer} points against {name2} with {integer2} points!!
blackjack.announce_tie: {name} and {name2} have TIED the blackjack game with {integer} points!
blackjack.hit: {mention}, you have received ||{string}||! Your current score is ||{integer}||.
blackjack.game_created: {name}, a blackjack game has been created. For a player to join you, they must type {server_prefix}jg @you (bet).

currency.beg_msg: {name}, a homeless man has given you {integer} {currency_name}(s).
currency.in_game: {name}, you cannot use Currency while you are in a game. Please type {server_prefix}stopbj.
currency.not_enough: {name}, you do not have enough {currency_name}s. You have {balance}.
currency.upgrade_msg: {name}, you need {integer} to level up {command_name}. Press the Thumbs Up Reaction within 1 minute to confirm.
currency.upgrade_not_enough: {name}, you need at least {integer} to upgrade {command_name}. You have {balance}.
currency.upgrade_out_of_time: {name}, you ran out of time to upgrade {command_name}.
currency.no_bots: {name}, you cannot perform that action on a bot!
currency.rps_win_loss: {name}, You {result} {integer} {currency_name}(s)! I chose {string} and you chose {string2}

customcommands.bot_command_exists: {command_name} is already a bot command and can not be added.
customcommands.custom_command_exists: {command_name} is already a custom command and can not be added.
customcommands.custom_command_added: {command_name} has been added as a command.
customcommands.custom_command_deleted: {command_name} has been removed if it existed.
customcommands.no_custom_commands: There are no custom commands for your server.

miscellaneous.set_language_fail: {name}, that is not an available language. Use one of the following: {languages}.
miscellaneous.set_language_success: {name}, your language is now set to {language}.
miscellaneous.terminating_games: {name}, I am terminating all the games that exist in this channel or by the host.
miscellaneous.no_game: No {string} game is currently in session.

utility.join_support_server_feature: In order to use this feature of {bot_name}, you must first join the Support Server at <{support_server_link}>

groupmembers.patron_msg:
As of September 23rd 2020, non-Patrons can only send {idol_post_send_limit} photos a day maximum, as the current host can not reliably handle additional traffic.
You may become a patron for as little as $3 per month in order to send unlimited photos; every Patron contributes to upgrading and maintaining the host.
If the guild owner is a super patron, All guild members (non-patrons) get {owner_super_patron_benefit} photos a day.
Please support <@{bot_id}>'s development at {patreon_link}.
Thank You.
groupmembers.add_idol_sent: {name}, your request for adding this Idol has been successfully sent. The Idol's query ID is {query_id}.
groupmembers.add_group_sent: {name}, your request for adding this Group has been successfully sent. The Group's query ID is {query_id}.
groupmembers.add_error:
An error occurred -> 
Error MSG: {e}
It is likely that you do not understand this error!
You can find more information about this command using {server_prefix}help {command_name}.
groupmembers.no_card_info: I could not find any information on that idol/group.
groupmembers.stop_images_disable: {text_channel} can no longer send or receive idol photos.
groupmembers.stop_images_enable: {text_channel} can now send and receive idol photos.
groupmembers.stop_images_fail: {text_channel} is currently being used with {server_prefix}sendimages and can not be restricted.
groupmembers.send_images_disable: {text_channel} will no longer send all idol photo commands.
groupmembers.send_images_enable: {text_channel} will now receive and send all idol photo commands coming from this server.
groupmembers.send_images_fail: {text_channel} is currently restricted from idol photos with {server_prefix}stopimages.
groupmembers.group_not_found: I could not find a group with that name.
groupmembers.idol_not_found: I could not find an idol with that name.
groupmembers.no_aliases:
No results were found. Please specify whether you want member or group aliases, or enter a name of an idol/group.
{server_prefix}help aliases
groupmembers.all_idol_count: All Idols have been called a total of {called} times.
groupmembers.not_called: {idol_name} has not been called by a user yet.
groupmembers.called_and_rank: {idol_name} has been called {called} times at rank {rank}.
groupmembers.send_idol_success:
The following idol(s) have been {result}: {result2}
This text channel currently receives idol photos every 12 hours from {result3}.
groupmembers.send_idol_fail: There was an issue adding/remove that idol.
groupmembers.send_idol_no_patron_limit: As a non-patron, you only have access to have posts from {integer} idols per text channel. Become a {server_prefix}patreon for more!
groupmembers.send_idol_limit: As a patron, you only have access to have posts from {integer} idols per text channel
groupmembers.no_photos: There are no photos for that idol id.
groupmembers.invalid_id: The ID you have entered is Invalid!
groupmembers.no_idols_to_remove: There are no idols to remove.

twitter.tweet_success: Your Tweet has been successfully uploaded to {tweet_url}
twitter.delete_success: The Tweet ID {tweet_id} has been successfully deleted.

general.out_of_range: The number you entered is out of the available range.
general.no_dm: You can not use this command in DMs.
general.error:
An error occurred -> Please report it on the support server.
Error MSG: {e}
general.no_n_word: That user has not said the N-Word a single time!
general.self_no_n_word: You have not said the N-Word a single time!
general.cooldown: You are on cooldown. Try again in {time}.
general.on_guild_join:
Hello!
My prefix for this server is set to {server_prefix}.
If you have any questions or concerns, you may join the support server ({server_prefix}support).
general.maintenance:
A maintenance is currently in progress. Join the support server for more information. <{support_server_link}>
REASON: {reason}
general.invalid_input: {name}, That option is not valid. Please look into {server_prefix}help {command_name}.
general.game_disabled: {name}, Games have been disabled in this text channel using {server_prefix}togglegames.

twitch.follow_limit: You are only allowed to have {follow_limit} channels followed.
twitch.already_followed: That twitch channel is already being followed.
twitch.now_following: This server will now receive notifications for {twitch_username}
twitch.stop_following: If this server was following that twitch channel, it was removed.
twitch.announcement_channel: Twitch announcements will now be sent to {text_channel}
twitch.no_role: Everyone will be tagged when there is a twitch announcement.
twitch.role: That role will be tagged when there is a twitch announcement.
twitch.following: This server is following these channels: {channels_followed}

interactions.no_self_use: {name}, you cannot perform this interaction on yourself.
interactions.patreon_footer: Become a {server_prefix}patreon to get rid of interaction cooldowns!
interactions.no_interactions: {name}, there are no links saved for this interaction yet.

reminder.remove_reminder: {name}, I will not remind you to {reason} on {time}.
reminder.max_reminders: {name}, You have reached the maximum limit ({reminder_limit}) for reminders you can have.
reminder.incorrect_format: {name}, that is not a proper reminder format. Use {server_prefix}help remindme for help with the acceptable format.
reminder.incorrect_time_format: {name}, you did not enter the correct time format.
reminder.incorrect_tz_input: Your input was not a user or a valid timezone.
reminder.too_long: {name}, the time for a reminder can not be greater than 2 years.
reminder.no_timezone: {name} does not not have a timezone set. Please use {server_prefix}{format}.
reminder.will_remind: {name}, I will remind you to {reason} on {time}.
reminder.user_time: {name}'s current time is {time} in the timezone {tz}.
reminder.remove_tz: {name}, if your timezone was set, it was removed.
reminder.invalid_tz: {name}, that is not a valid timezone. Please use {server_prefix}{format}.
reminder.add_tz: {name}, your timezone has been set to {tz}, where it is currently {time}.

botowner.cards_added: All cards have been added into the table.
botowner.group_fail: Failed to add Group {group_id}. Proceeding to add idol.
botowner.idol_query_approved:
Added Query ID {query_id} as an Idol ({idol_id}).
This idol has been added to the following groups: {group_ids}.
The cache is now refreshing.
botowner.group_query_approved:
Added Query ID {query_id} as a Group ({group_id}).
The cache is now refreshing.

moderator.welcome_role_delete: The welcome role you had set was removed.
moderator.no_role_to_delete: There is no welcome role to remove.
moderator.welcome_role_set: The new welcome role has been set.
moderator.channel_not_found: That text channel was not found.

music.no_channel: There is no voice channel for me to join.
music.no_songs: Could not find any songs with that search query.
music.volume_status: The volume of the player is now set to {result}.
music.shuffled: If there were songs in the queue, they were shuffled.
music.empty_queue: The song queue is currently empty.
music.no_api_key: There is no API Key currently set for the Lyrics and the Developer is working on it.
music.no_lyrics: No lyrics were found for that query.
music.moved_song: Moved {title} by {artist} to the next song in queue.
music.no_nodes: There are no nodes available to play a track.

vlive.list_channel_codes: This is a list of the Vlive channel codes in this channel: {result}.
vlive.invalid_code: That code does not belong to a Vlive Channel.
vlive.unfollowed: This channel is no longer following {result}.
vlive.unknown_code: The code of that {result} is not known. Feel free to use the code command instead.
